#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define lli long long int
#define s(x) scanf("%lld", &x)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define fr first
#define sc second

using namespace std;

lli dp[105][24*60+5];

vector<pair<lli, lli> > vv;

lli arr[105], brr[105];

int main()
{

    //freopen("sd.txt", "r", stdin);
    lli tcase,tt,n,m,i,j,k,ans,temp;

    s(tcase);

    tt = 1;

    while (tt <= tcase) {
        printf("Case %lld: ", tt);
        vv.clear();
        ++tt;
        s(n);

        for (i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
            s(arr[i]);
        }

        for (i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
            s(brr[i]);
        }

        vv.pb(mp(-5, -5));

        for (i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
            vv.pb(mp(brr[i], arr[i]));
        }

        sort(vv.begin(), vv.end());

        lli ii;

        for (i = 0; i <= n; ++i) {
            dp[i][0] = i;
        }

        for (i = 0; i <= 24*60; ++i) {
            dp[0][i] = 0;
        }

        for (i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
            for (j = 0; j <= 24*60; ++j) {
                if (vv[i].fr == -1) {
                    dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j];
                    continue;
                }

                dp[i][j] = 1 + dp[i-1][j];

                if ((min(vv[i].fr-30, j) - vv[i].sc) >= 0) {
                    dp[i][j] = min(dp[i][j], dp[i-1][(min(vv[i].fr-30, j) - vv[i].sc)]);
                }
            }
        }

        printf("%lld\n", dp[n][24*60]);
    }


    return 0;
}
